response.overview: Hope A Brooklyn Story is an inner city film that is an instantly relatable and surprisingly deep tale of  love, power, retribution and hope .Dennis a real state agent caught in a love triangle with his grade school girlfriend whom has a baby by local king pin Moshae
response.tagline: Three best friends bond like brothers. Their simple world changes forever one fateful night after a visit to a deli.
response.title: Hope A Brooklyn Story
